abstract: General Motors is expected this week to close its sale of Saab Automobile of Sweden to Spyker Cars of the Netherlands, two executives involved with the deal told Bloomberg News.
snippet: General Motors is expected this week to close its sale of Saab Automobile of Sweden to Spyker Cars of the Netherlands, two executives involved with the deal told Bloomberg News.
lead_paragraph: General Motors is expected this week to close its sale of Saab Automobile of Sweden to Spyker Cars of the Netherlands, two executives involved with the deal told Bloomberg News.

headline.main: G.M.’s Sale of Saab Seen Likely to Close This Week
